content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Smith. I understand that you are looking to lease a space that meets your needs. Let's discuss the terms that would be most agreeable to you. How much are you willing to pay for the 25 square meters apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your time, Mr. Heine. I'm looking to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I'm a student, so I'm on a budget, but I'm also very dependable and responsible. I would like to maintain a good relationship with my landlord. How much is the lowest price you can offer for the apartment?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: As a responsible landlord, I am willing to negotiate a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while taking into consideration your budget as a student. What is the highest price you would be comfortable paying?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: As a student, I'm looking to keep my expenses as low as possible. I would ideally like to pay no more than $800 per month. Is this something that might be possible?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mr. Smith. While $800 per month is lower than my initial expectations for the apartment, I am willing to work with you as a student. I can offer you a special rate of $850 per month, which is a significant discount from my usual asking price. This rate includes all utilities and services. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Heinrich Heine
